name: Protect the shelter
description:
Weekly Game Jam - Week 152

Theme - Shelter

The idea is that you got lost in the woods and was able to build a small shelter. The locals don't like you in their area and want you gone. You have to build traps and shoot your weapon to get rid of them before they reach your shelter. (I'm bad at art, so imagination is required)

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

Q - Build Trap

E - Player Mode

1 - Spike Trap

2 - Slow Trap

Unfortunately you have to reopen the game if you lose or win to play again.
